title: Aeradio: the pilot's link to the ground
creator_credit: John Martin-Jones, Australian National Film Board and Department of the Interior
brief_description: An insight into the work of the Communications Officers - the men who keep a constant radio check on all aircraft in the air, maintaining voice or morse contact with the pilots, supplying information on weather conditions ahead, giving position, and acting, generally, as the pilot’s agent on the ground.
